block.p: Androniki Piatos and James Lolis, who work for Grey Advertising in Manhattan but didn't meet until a mutual friend arranged a blind date, were married yesterday. The Rev. Nicholas Soteropoulos performed the ceremony at St. Demetrios Greek Orthodox Church in Jamaica, Queens.

Mrs. Lolis, 30, is known as Niki. She is a media buyer for the Mediacom division of Grey. Mr. Lolis, 35, is a vice president and an associate creative director of the Grey Healthcare Group, the agency's health care and pharmaceutical advertising division.
